title: Health Library Orientation: Customized Information Search Strategies

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital information access skills (able to use smartphones)
context.additional_context: Learning in Limited Technology Environments for Professionals in Medical/Legal/Technical Fields

learning_goals: Learners can explain at least three key health library services (literature search, academic resource access, reference consultation)
Learners can demonstrate the health information search process in mobile environments
Learners can identify two types of health library resources applicable to project-based assessments

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
